hero.title: Empowering Learners
hero.subtitle: Around the World
hero.description: At LEAP PM, we're on a mission to make quality education accessible to everyone. We believe learning should be engaging, effective, and available anytime, anywhere.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These core principles guide everything we do

studentCentered.title: Student-Centered
studentCentered.description: Every decision we make puts learners first. We believe education should be accessible, engaging, and transformative.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push boundaries with cutting-edge technology to deliver the best learning experience.

community.title: Community
community.description: Learning is better together. We foster connections between students, instructors, and industry professionals.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We maintain the highest standards in course quality, platform reliability, and customer support.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We operate with transparency, honesty, and accountability in everything we do.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Education should be available to everyone, everywhere. We break down barriers to learning.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: From a simple idea to a thriving learning community

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.description: LEAP PM was founded with a vision to democratize education and make quality learning accessible to everyone.

firstThousand.title: First 1,000 Students
firstThousand.description: Reached our first milestone of 1,000 active students and launched our mobile app.

expansion.title: Platform Expansion
expansion.description: Added live sessions, social learning features, and expanded to 50+ countries.

aiIntegration.title: AI Integration
aiIntegration.description: Integrated AI-powered personalized learning paths and advanced analytics.

fiftyThousand.title: 50,000+ Learners
fiftyThousand.description: Surpassed 50,000 active learners and 1,000 courses across all categories.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate professionals dedicated to transforming education

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.bio: Former EdTech executive with 15+ years of experience in online education.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.bio: Tech innovator passionate about building scalable learning platforms.

emily.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily.bio: Product leader focused on creating delightful user experiences.

david.name: David Park
david.bio: Engineering expert with a track record of building high-performance systems.

jessica.name: Jessica Martinez
jessica.bio: Curriculum developer ensuring the highest quality learning materials.

ryan.name: Ryan Thompson
ryan.bio: Growth specialist helping learners discover their potential.

cta.title: Join Us on This Journey
cta.description: Whether you're a learner, instructor, or partner, there's a place for you at LEAP PM.
